thread.title: Muhammad Ali's Son Detained At Florida Airport, Asked Whether He's A Muslim
thread.title_full: Muhammad Ali's Son Detained At Florida Airport, Asked Whether He's A Muslim

author: Anahita Khanna
title: Muhammad Ali's Son Detained At Florida Airport, Asked Whether He's A Muslim
text:
Muhammad Ali's Son Detained At Florida Airport, Asked Whether He's A Muslim Officials questioned Ali Jr for nearly two hours. 25/02/2017 1:30 PM IST | Updated 41 minutes ago Xeni Jardin/Twitter ADVERTISEMENT 
FORT LAUDERDALE -- A lawyer says the son of legendary boxer Muhammad Ali was detained by immigration officials at a Florida airport. 
Chris Mancini tells the Courier-Journal in Louisville, Kentucky that 44-year-old Muhammad Ali Jr and his mother Khalilah Camacho-Ali, the second wife of Muhammad Ali, arrived at Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport on 7 February after returning from Jamaica. 
Mancini says officials questioned Ali Jr for nearly two hours, repeatedly asking him, "Where did you get your name from?" and "Are you Muslim?" 
Mancini says officials continued questioning Ali Jr after acknowledging that he was Muslim. Ali Jr was born in Philadelphia and holds a US passport. 
US Customs and Border Protection officials say they "cannot discuss individual travelers; however, all international travelers arriving in the US are subject to CBP inspection." 
Also on HuffPost India
